Title: Palm Springs
Writer: Andy Siara (screenplay by), Andy Siara (story by)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Cristin Milioti, J.K. Simmons, Peter Gallagher
Plot: Stuck in a time loop, two wedding guests develop a budding romance while living the same day over and over again.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 11 wins & 39 nominations.
